ai-patthana19.2:0.2_0: under the investigation of the Dhamma: One whatever is suitable for the three times of the Dhamma
ai-patthana19.2:1.1_0: Not feeling arises dependent on pleasant feeling,
ai-patthana19.2:1.1_1: Neutral feeling arises dependent on pleasant feeling. Painful feeling arises dependent on the Teaching.
ai-patthana19.2:1.1_2: Neutral feeling arises dependent on a pleasant feeling. Painful feeling arises conditioned by feeling.
ai-patthana19.2:2.1_0: Neutral feeling arises dependent on feeling. Painful feeling arises dependent on the painful feeling.
ai-patthana19.2:2.1_1: Neutral feeling arises dependent on feeling. Placing the teaching is a condition for pleasant feeling.
ai-patthana19.2:2.1_2: Neutral feeling arises dependent on a thought with neither-painful-nor-pleasant feeling.
ai-patthana19.2:3.1_0: Neutral feeling arises dependent on the pleasant feeling. Painful feeling arises dependent on the teaching and associated with painful feeling.
ai-patthana19.2:3.1_1: Neutral feeling arises dependent on the pleasant feeling.
ai-patthana19.2:3.1_2: Neutral feeling arises dependent on the pleasant feeling. Painful feeling arises dependent on the painful feeling.
ai-patthana19.2:3.1_3: This is the section in brief.
